title: Pixel 6 and 6 Pro officially go on sale in Italy and Spain at the Google Store
content:
After an extended wait, the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro are now officially available in Spain and Italy after going on sale via the Google Store in both regions.

more…

description: The Pixel 6 and 6 Pro are now officially available in Spain and Italy after going on sale at the Google Store in both regions.
